feed.title: LF-Air
feed.subtitle: RSS feed based on RSS and LLM.

entry.title: Vite report on Sat, 14 Oct 2023 08:03:28
entry.summary:
Tech:
- YouTube is facing scrutiny from the EU regarding the war in Israel.
- Apple Loop highlights iPhone 15 Pro battery problems and MacBook Pro delays.
- Android Circuit reviews Pixel 8 and 8 Pro, and discusses Pixel Watch problems.
- Supercharge Graph Analytics at Scale with GPU-CPU Fusion for 100x Performance.

Business:
- The World of Hyatt Business Card is ending its offer for 2 free nights at expensive hotels.
- John Wiley & Sons stock dropped 12% this week.
- Ripcord, a file scanning startup backed by Steve Wozniak, is raising new cash.
- EV data startup Volteras aims to bring Tesla-level control to every vehicle and charger.
- 6 VCs provide insights on capturing and defending market share in the AI era.
- African startups are experiencing a decrease in capital availability in Q3.

AI:
- 6 VCs explain how startups can capture and defend market share in the AI era.

Other:
- Montana State Library Commission votes to eliminate educational resources.
- The desert ghost town known as 'Mini Gaza' is used by the Israel Defense Forces for urban warfare training.
- 'The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon' may need a new name now that Carol is returning.
- Solar eclipse path in 2023 shows where to see the 'ring of fire' across the United States.
- Antarctica has lost 8.3 trillion tons of ice since 1997.
- Russia is using 'human wave' tactics in eastern Ukraine, according to the White House.
- Jeff Bezos reportedly bought a $79 million home on a private island known as 'Billionaire Bunker.'
- Over 1 million people in Gaza were forced to evacuate within 24 hours due to an Israeli order.
- Kodable is hiring a Unity game developer to teach kids to code.
- Amid a breakup, Synapse and Evolve address allegations about their relationship.
- The FDA warns that "Ketamine Therapy" may just be partying.
- Female frogs pretend to be dead to deal with annoying males.
- A digital-only gaming future is inevitable.
